answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
A question similar to yours was asked previously. The link below goes to the question and answers about creating a 5-year financial plan.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/20535 
I have also included some other sample budgets and articles about the best practices in developing a long term budget.
Olathe, KS created a budgeting power point which discusses and shows sample general fund forecasting charts.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301789
I have included a sample budget from San Diego CA which details their 5-Year Financial Outlook. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301691 
Below is a sample Three-Year Financial Strategic Plan Handout used by Long Beach, CA.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7006/ThreeYear_Financial_Strategic_Plan_Handout 
Another article from City Of San Luis Obispo, CA discusses how to integrate goal setting into budgetary processes.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/12540
A similar article discusses the award winning used by William County, VA.
http://icma.org/en/Article/100588/Prince_William_County_VA_Wins_Two__Achievement_Awards 
This article describes how to best plan for the financial stability of your community.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/4254
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
